#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int a[51];
int main() {
	int n,i,j,s,k = 0;
	cin >> n;
	while(n != 0) {
		k++;
		s = 0;
		for(i = 0 ; i < n ; i++) {
			cin >> a[i];
			s += a[i];
		}
		j = s/n;
		s = 0;
		for(i = 0 ; i < n ; i++) s += (((a[i]-j)>0)?a[i]-j:j-a[i]);
		cout << "Set #" << k << endl << "The minimum number of moves is " << (s/2) << "." << endl;
		cin >> n;
	}
	return 0;
}
